extension_name.message: Saladict, a Pluma-Dives Inline Interpres. Chrome / Incendia Tractus.

extension_description.message: Saladict est a professio verbum-translatio tractus, creavit, pro crux crucis-lectio. Suus numerus auctoritate dictionaries cover anglica, gallica, Italica, hispanica, et firmamentum complexu verbum processus, web page translationem, verbum libros, et PDF pasco.

command_open_quick_search.message: Aperiam aut highlight standalone dict panel

command_search_clipboard.message: Quaero clipboard contentus in Standalone Panel
